about.details:
Incorporated in the year 2014, Samor Reality is engaged in the construction and development of residential and commercial projects, in and around Ahmedabad, Gujarat. The company has developed versatile projects by focussing on innovative architecture, strong project execution, and quality construction.

The company intends to exploit the opportunities that are available in the Real Estate Sector and its operations may cover all aspects of real estate development. The company may also enter into project-specific joint ventures or partnerships with other companies to enhance its credentials.

The company is also engaged in the activity of trading building and construction materials specifically TMT Bars, HR Sheets of different sizes. The total of 100% of revenue for the year ended on March 31, 2021, is from trading activity. The company’s projects are marketed under the brand name of “Samor”.

Competitive strengths

  • A Experienced Management Team with an in-depth understanding of the real estate market in the region.
  • Established brand and good brand reputation.
  • Overall management of projects.
  • Customer-centric, scalable business model.
  • Quality Assurance and Standard.

faqs.question: What is the Samor Reality Limited IPO?
faqs.answer:
Samor Reality Limited IPO is a SME IPO of 1300000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.06 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹62 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 30, 2021, and closes on October 5, 2021.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Samor Reality Limited IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Samor Reality Limited IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Samor Reality Limited IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Samor Reality Limited IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Samor Reality Limited IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Samor Reality Limited IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Samor Reality Limited IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
